DOC.brief_title: Electrical Signal Collection From 20 Pole Catheter During Routine Cardiac Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study collect atrio-ventricular electrograms use sequence tip-ring spacing patient undergo routine cardiac procedure ( EP study , pacemaker/ICD/CRT implant ) . To collect signal , 20 pole catheter ( Medtronic StableMapr intracardiac steerable electrode catheter ) acutely place RV apex routine cardiac procedure . Routine data collection conduct normal sinus rhythm AV synchronous pace approximately 20 minute . The data collect processed P , R T wave amplitude measure .
